thread.title: Donald Trump Just Lost A Shit-Ton Of $$$!
thread.title_full: Donald Trump Just Lost A Shit-Ton Of $$$!

author: Perez Hilton
title: Donald Trump Just Lost A Shit-Ton Of $$$!
text:
2/01/2017 6:54   Zportz • Legal Matters • Politik • Donald Trump • Business Blitz • Golf 
More like asshole-in-one… 
On Wednesday, U.S. District Court Judge Kenneth Marra ruled that Donald Trump 's golf course in Jupiter, Florida — Trump National Golf Club — must pay former members $5.7 million dollars! 
Related: Donald Trump Wants To Kick Out More Immigrants! 
Back in 2013, a class action lawsuit was filed against the luxury establishment after 65 individuals claimed the terms of their membership changed when the businessman took over in 2012. As a result, they were unlawfully kicked out of the resort. 
Being the cheapskate that he is, the now-President allegedly refused to give people back their deposits — ranging from $35,000 to $210,000 — AND their annual dues. 
Trump's team has yet to comment. 
Donnie is a failure in both politics AND business !
